remediation: Upgrade openssh-portable to version 9.6-p1 or higher.
title: OS Command Injection

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to OS Command Injection due to improper handling of user names or host names containing shell metacharacters. A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary OS commands by using expansion tokens (e.g., %u , %h ) with such user names or host names.
